about_the_game:
What if there was a Virtual Tabletop in which you could do everything? From map making, to writing and organizing your campaigns, customizing characters and of course rolling dice! Exordium was built for this. Envisioned to be an all-in-one program, in order to make GMs and players lifes easier, simpler and even more exciting playing their favorite RPGs.


MAP BUILDING TOOLS

If you like to put a lot of thought into building your ideal map, we have many great tools that will help you do that. Exordium's type of map building is organic in a sim-like fashion. Start by choosing the best setting for your map, then jump into terraforming your ideal terrain, building walls or rooms, filling it with flooring, adding doors, windows, furniture and all kinds of decorations to the place. So far we have over 300 assets for your maps and will be releasing more every week.


SHAPE YOUR OWN CHARACTERS

Use the Character Customization menu to give your character the looks you'd imagine. With over 40 sliders for face and body, your character could take any shape you imagine. Add dozens of different types of horns, ears, tails, tattoos and piercings. Dress them with an assortment of beautiful armor and clothing options.


YOUR FAVORITE SYSTEMS

Exordium comes with RPG systems integrated, which means that it's that easier to check for rules and other content inside the program. With integrated systems you can also create your own playable characters with a very easy-to-follow character creator.


A WAYS TO GO

We are still midway though our development and there's much to add and improve. We would love to have you as a part of the community, to give us feedback, suggestions and to help us better our program. For that you can join our beginning Discord community here

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
